title: Apron
description: black cotton in two unequal sections; top section: embroidered insets, two squares and one rectangle, edged in orange and red applique; geometric embroidery in red, green and purple on white; lower section: three bands bordered in orange/red; outer bands geometric embroidery in red, green and purple on white; center band has white embroidery on green (machine stitch); bands are inset into printed figured cotton in red and yellow green on blue background (school print)
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
